page.title: 11HOLIDAYS IN DUFTON
page.content: I've been coming to Dufton for at least part of my holidays for 21 years,ever since my university room- mate introduced me to the village in our first year.My children have come with me ever since each one was born: friends have joined us from time to time & few have failed to return. We come for the open lonely fells, for the sharply rising mountainsides, for the unexpected gurgling streams froth- ing on their way to the valley bottom & the stately river Eden. We come for the familiar friendly faces,curious but respecting our differing life- styles.We all enjoy & treasure the days we share. Dufton is so different from where we live -with the hustle & bustle of the city & our working lives -but a small part of us stays gloriously unrestrainedly on holiday in Dufton.
